short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Monitor and analyze JavaScript risk in the browser.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Polykill provides an advanced risk analysis of all JavaScript running on a given website.

Easily inventory and track JavaScript loading on every page load

Analyze the URLs for risk from known public sources (malware, block lists)

Understand the 3rd party breach history of the script owner (aka the third party)

Perform a script runtime analysis to understand any sensitive data that could be captured or sent to 3rd parties.
